I ordered this dress weeks in advance for my mother's funeral. Given she wasn't well, I wanted to have a dress on hand so I wouldn't have to think about it when it was time. I admit I watched my weight so I wouldn't have lumps or bumps, but with all of the stress and sadness it wasn't hard. I am 5'3", 125lbs, 34D and have fuller hips. The small fit like it was custom made for me. It is nice, thick fabric and feels/looks very high quality. I'm 50 years old and even though it is form fitting, it's very classy and tasteful. I felt confident and had many compliments.

评论概述: Great EXCEPT the Neckline is too high
评论详情: I absolutely loved the fit, fabric and color of this dress. Unfortunately, I found the neckline to be about 2 inches too high, which made my already amble bust look even bigger (which for me is not a plus). I prefer to show more décolletage (not necessarily cleavage) to break up his the eye is drawn so that I don’t look like I have breasts from my neck to my waist! The color is perfect though, and the fabric is a nice thickness and stretch. It keeps its shape well.

I'm 5'7", 150 pounds.  I bought this dress for a professional photo shoot.  I love the color (teal) and it looked great in the pictures.  I usually wear a medium in dresses and that is what I ended up with because the large wouldn't have arrived in time.  While it fit okay (because it has a lot of stretch and I wore shapewear), I think a large would have been a better fit.  I recommend the dress, however I can't vouch for how well it will hold up after washing.  You may want to dry clean it if you want to love it for a long time.

Well this one was for my wife, she hates doing reviews so I'll transcribe.At first she was hesitant to order a dress online. I informed her of the easy return policy of prime.Well it fit right out of the envelope!  She just loves this thing.  All her "friends" from work just loved it too.  We're in our late 50's and found it quite appropriate for her Christmas party.

This is my second purchase of a MUXXN dress/different style but same fabric. This fabric that needs care. I hand wash this dress, hang dry, and use a steam iron/low heat. Its worth the trouble because these dresses are beautiful.
